Wasserportal Berlin: get stations overview table

Source: R/get_wasserportal_stations_table.R
get_wasserportal_stations_table.Rd

Wasserportal Berlin: get stations overview table

get_wasserportal_stations_table(
  type = get_overview_options()$groundwater$level,
  url_wasserportal = wasserportal_base_url()
)

Arguments

type

type of stations table to retrieve. Valid options defined in get_overview_options, default: get_overview_options()$groundwater$level
url_wasserportal

base url to Wasserportal berlin (default: wasserportal_base_url

Value

data frame with master data of selected monitoring stations

Examples

types <- wasserportal::get_overview_options()
str(types)

#> List of 2
#>  $ surface_water:List of 7
#>   ..$ water_level         : chr "ws"
#>   ..$ flow                : chr "df"
#>   ..$ level               : chr "wt"
#>   ..$ conductivity        : chr "lf"
#>   ..$ ph                  : chr "ph"
#>   ..$ oxygen_concentration: chr "og"
#>   ..$ oxygen_saturation   : chr "os"
#>  $ groundwater  :List of 2
#>   ..$ level  : chr "gws"
#>   ..$ quality: chr "gwq"
sw_l <- wasserportal::get_wasserportal_stations_table(type = types$surface_water$water_level)
str(sw_l)

#> tibble [69 × 9] (S3: tbl_df/tbl/data.frame)
#>  $ Messstellennummer: int [1:69] 5865900 5827103 5865300 5819900 5864801 5861101 5800107 5800317 5867401 5800301 ...
#>  $ Messstellenname  : chr [1:69] "Allee der Kosmonauten" "Allendestraße" "Am Bahndamm" "Am Freibad" ...
#>  $ Gewaesser        : chr [1:69] "M.-H.-Grenzgr." "Müggelspree" "Wuhle" "Tegeler Fließ" ...
#>  $ Betreiber        : chr [1:69] "SenUVK" "SenUVK" "SenUVK" "SenUVK" ...
#>  $ Datum            : chr [1:69] "10.03.2021 16:00" "10.03.2021 16:00" "08.03.2021 00:00" "10.03.2021 16:00" ...
#>  $ Wasserstand      : int [1:69] 0 53 96 100 4 40 62 72 36 42 ...
#>  $ Einheit          : chr [1:69] "cm" "cm" "cm" "cm" ...
#>  $ Ganglinien       : logi [1:69] NA NA NA NA NA NA ...
#>  $ Klassifikation   : chr [1:69] "niedrig" "normal" "nicht aktuell" "normal" ...
